location_short_descr: Mont Pèlerin is a summit of the Swiss plateau located in the municipality of Chardonne in Switzerland.
location_long_descr: The two Mythen form the backdrop to the heart of Switzerland - and the 360° panorama of the Grosser Mythen is overwhelming! Around the two Mythen there are beautiful hiking trails and secluded paths through this natural paradise in the Pre-Alps with the largest nature reserve in the canton of Schwyz. The new Rotenfluebahn in Schwyz/Rickenbach leads directly up the Rotenflue to the ascent to the Grosser Mythen in just 10 minutes.
